message.body: Hey! i'm really reallyssorry, i just saw you left me a message and listened to it. i can talk now if you want to talk? or sometime tomorrow night? miss you>
That situation is fine. I will fill you in. Now Anna is being weird. Can you talk sometime tomorrow?
She's here now so I can't talk now
Ok, i'm glad one thing is ok, but i'm sorry another is weird! i would love to talk tomorrow. however i can only do before 11:30am or after 10pm, sorry. could you do either of those blocks?
After 10pm it is...but I try to go to bed by 11
Ok, that is smart. Do you want me to let you know as soon as i get off work? it is usually around 10 but sometimes we get out a lil before.
Hey, i'm really sorry, i'm still at work. i'm not sure when i'll be out. do you want me to let you know when i'm out and if it's too late for you we'll talk tomorrow or whenever you can?
Hey! No worries. I have talked to Elise and Lizzy about it so what say we talk tomorrow? I usually get home from work by 5:45
Ok, cool. I have jury duty tomorrow, but i bet i'll be home by 5:45. do you want to shoot for talking then?
Sure! I just remembered I might stop to get groceries but I will text you when I can talk
Ok, awesome! i will await your text.
